Title: Visual Studio Code Line Counter
Description: Counts the number of lines of code included in a Visual Studio solution.
HomeWiki:
What It Does

VS Code Line Counter takes a Visual Studio solution file, parses it for all of its included projects, parses each project for its included code files, and counts the number of lines in each file.

 

A Little History

I made this app after the projects I created began to have more than a few dozen files. Counting the number of lines manually on some of my projects could take well over 10 minutes, besides being error-prone.
